com.magnet.android.mms.settings

Class MagnetDefaultSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magnet.android.mms.settings.MagnetDefaultSettings

  • public class MagnetDefaultSettings
extends Object
    This class loads factory settings from "res/xml/magnet_app_default.xml". If this file is not present, it uses reasonable defaults.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ATTRIB_CACHE_ENCRYPTION_ENABLE
      Enables encryption in the data cache.
      Valid values are "true" (default), "false".
      static String ATTRIB_CONNECT_TIMEOUT
      Internal Use Only
      static String ATTRIB_MAGNET_VERSION
      Magnet version upon which this app is dependent (used in User-Agent).

      Project name (used in User-Agent).

      Project version (used in User-Agent).
      static String ATTRIB_READ_TIMEOUT
      Internal Use Only

      Internal Use Only

      Cache related settings.
      static String TAG_HTTP
      Internal Use Only
      static String TAG_PROJECT
      General project information for the Magnet application.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MagnetDefaultSettings getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes the global instance of MagnetDefaultSettings. Loads the factory default settings from "res/xml/magnet_app_default.xml".
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        Returns:
        A global instance of MagnetDefaultSettings, or null if the factory settings file does not exist.

      • getInstanceFromResource

        public static MagnetDefaultSettings getInstanceFromResource(android.content.Context context,
                                            int resId)
        Initializes the global instance of MagnetDefaultSettings from the user-specified resource. Loads the default settings from the XML resource file (res/xml/.xml).
        Parameters:
        context - Android application context.
        resId - The resource ID of the XML file. For example, R.xml.my_app_default.
        Returns:
        A global instance of MagnetDefaultSettings, or null if the resource file does not exist.

      • release

        public void release()
        Set the global instance to null to force reload of settings on next call to getInstance(Context)

      • getInstanceDefault

        public static MagnetDefaultSettings getInstanceDefault()
        Initializes the global instance of MagnetDefaultSettings using default values, without a settings file. Loads values using internal hard-coded values.
        Returns:
        A global instance of MagnetDefaultSettings.

      • getCacheEncryptionEnabled

        public boolean getCacheEncryptionEnabled()
        Indicates whether cache encryption is enabled.
        Returns:
        false if disabled by the factory default settings file; true otherwise.

      • getProjectName

        public String getProjectName()
        Retrieves the project name.
        Returns:
        The project name.

      • getProjectVersion

        public String getProjectVersion()
        Retrieves the project version.
        Returns:
        The project version.

      • getMagnetVersion

        public String getMagnetVersion()
        Retrieves the Magnet version with which this project was built.
        Returns:
        The Magnet version.

      • getHttpConnectTimeoutMillis

        public int getHttpConnectTimeoutMillis()
        Retrieves the HTTP connect timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The HTTP connect timeout in milliseconds.

      • getHttpReadTimeoutMillis

        public int getHttpReadTimeoutMillis()
        Retrieves the HTTP read timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The HTTP read timeout in milliseconds.

      • getSslHostnameVerifier

        public String getSslHostnameVerifier()
        Retrieves the SSL Hostname Verifier to use. Possible values are STRICT, ALLOW_ALL, and BROWSER_COMPAT.
        Returns:
        The SSL Hostname Verifier to use.
